name: Procedural Weapon and Level Generation for FPS Shooter
name_original: Procedural Weapon and Level Generation for FPS Shooter
description:
Procedural Weapon and Level Generation for FPS Shooter

How to Play:

1. Generate the level by choosing your own Level Size and Max Iterations. (Do Not Click Next without generating the level)

2. Generate Weapon by clicking on the Generate Weapon Button, Keep clicking until you get a weapon with good stats

3. Hit Start 

4. Walk towards the weapon and Press 'E' to pickup and equip the weapon

5. Shoot the randomly placed targets by using LeftMouseClick !

Have funn!
